name: Grand Police Transport Games
description:
Get ready to play and experience the most adventurous game in simulation category by playing a role of police driver in this Grand Police Transport Games. This is a great addition to your playing list. So it's time to become a full time policeman driver and showing your skills by driving different vehicle from one destination to another. Begin your duty in Grand Police Transport Games. The department is getting short of vehicles to stop crime and perform their task so deliver them vehicles. Your duty includes different driving missions to pick and drop at various locations. Play your part in city’s peace by driving and transporting from road to hills and in sea's too.

Be a truck,car,ship driver on duty to trat police vehicles. Follow traffic rules and fulfill your duty as the police bus driver. There are several modes in this game including city mode, Offroad mode and night mode. Complete modes to unlock other and enjoy fleet of different vehicles.
